tool.name: Spatial-course analysis

param.name: species
param.label: fetch the annotation information from EnsemblPlants

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
*Spatial-course analysis* identify the significantly differentially expressed genes at each tissue and enrichment functions
-------------
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
**prepared gene expression matrix** - the prepared gene expression matrix through the **Matrix preparation** tool
.. csv-table:: :header: " ", "AL", "BETL", "CSE", "CZ" :widths: 15, 10, 10, 10, 10
"Zm00001d027230", 0.116, 0.0336, 0.0846, 0.0656 "Zm00001d027231", 7.952, 1.067, 3.788, 3.027 "Zm00001d027232", 0.00997, 0.00337, 0, 0.00606 "Zm00001d027233", 0.00899, 0.00507, 0.00722, 0.00558
|
**amplitude matrix** - generated from the prepared gene expression matrix through **Matrix factorization** tool in the **History** panel
.. csv-table:: :header: " ", "NC1", "NC2", "NC3", "NC4" :widths: 15, 10, 10, 10, 10
"Zm00001d027230", 0.356, 0.103, 0.357, 0.903 "Zm00001d027231", 4.310, 1.230, 7.122, 9.690 "Zm00001d027232", 0, 0.813, 0.0322, 0.0295 "Zm00001d027233", 0.0130, 0.0602, 0.0291, 0.0219
|
**pattern matrix** - generated from the prepared gene expression matrix through **Matrix factorization** tool in the **History** panel
.. csv-table:: :header: " ", "NC1", "NC2", "NC3" :widths: 10, 10, 10, 10
"AL", 7.194e-05, 1.349e-05, 0.442 "BETL", 6.484e-05, 1.638e-05, 1.778e-03 "CSE", 1.589e-05, 0, 1.090e-04 "CZ", 2.064e-05, 0, 4.796e-04
|
**species** - select the species to fetch the annotation inforamtion from EnsemblPlants
-------------
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs**
**enrichment analysis for each tissue**:
+--------+--------+---------------+------------------------------------------+ | tissue | domain | GO.ID | Term | +========+========+===============+==========================================+ | | AL | BP | `GO:0005985` | sucrose metabolic process | +--------+--------+---------------+------------------------------------------+ | | AL | BP | `GO:0007088` | regulation of mitotic nuclear division | +--------+--------+---------------+------------------------------------------+ | | AL | CC | `GO:0016021` | integral component of membrane | +--------+--------+---------------+------------------------------------------+ | | BETL | BP | `GO:0071586` | CAAX-box protein processing | +--------+--------+---------------+------------------------------------------+
|
**spatial specific genes expression module**:
.. image:: static/spatial_specific_genes_expression_module.jpg :width: 500 px :scale: 50 % :align: center
|
-------------
|
